author: marioevz
content:
Let me try it out, my guess is that t8n needs to be updated because we pass this new field in the transactions json file we send to the server:
```json
"authorizationList": [
            {
                "chainId": "0x0",
                "address": "0x0000000000000000000000000000000000001000",
                "nonce": "0x0",
                "v": "0x0",
                "r": "0xdbcff17ff6c249f13b334fa86bcbaa1afd9f566ca9b06e4ea5fab9bdde9a9202",
                "s": "0x5c34c9d8af5b20e4a425fc1daf2d9d484576857eaf1629145b4686bac733868e",
                "signer": "0xa94f5374fce5edbc8e2a8697c15331677e6ebf0b"
            }
        ],
```

author: marioevz
content: It seems to be working out of the box üòÑ

author: _shemnon
content: That's what I get for using production data structures in test drivers.

content: Actually daniel lehrner added it by hand to t8n as part of his work.
